content: उद्वर्तनं {@--1@} Going up, rising. {@--2@} Springing up, growth (of plants, grain &c.). {@--3@} Prosperity, elevation. {@--4@} Turning from side to side; springing up, popping the head; चटुलशफरोद्वर्तनप्रेक्षितानि <ls>Me. 40.</ls> {@--5@} Griding, pounding. {@--6@} Drawing out metal, wire-drawing. {@--7@} Anointing, smearing; करोद्वर्तनार्थे चंदनं समर्पयामि. {@--8@} Particularly, rubbing and cleaning the body with perfumes or fragrant unguents, or the unguents used for this purpose or to relieve pain; <ls>Y. 1. 152</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 132</ls> ( अभ्यंगमलापकर्षणपिष्टकादि <ls>Kull.</ls>). {@--9@} Bad behaviour or conduct, rudeness.
